title: Ep243 Suspected Satanists
description:
This week, the gals channel their darker side to chat about some devilish delinquents. Topics include an egomaniacal organist, one very unholy homicide, and the devastating outcome of a debunked psychological tactic. Brew up a pot of London Fog, do not try to recover those memories, and tune in for Suspected Satanists.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
